DOC.HEADLINE: BRIEFLY : AIRLINES
DOC.TEXT: TWA , Machinists Union Reach Agreements : Trans World Airlines said the tentative pacts with its largest union provides new work-rule and productivity changes that would generate significant cost savings.Details of the plans were not immediately available . The machinists union represents 13 # 800 of TWA ' s 24 # 500 U.S. workers , and the St . Louis-based airline views the agreements as a key first_step in an effort to reverse its recent losses . Members of the International Assn . of Machinists and Aerospace Workers will vote on the proposed changes Aug . 25-30 , TWA said .
